lines.text: You should have waited awhile. Cooled it! What's the damn rush?
Well, I tell you, Jack, you wait around, you get fat.
You have to admit that since we disagree on everything, we have a lot in common.
I'm always on time; it's one of my failings.
I was driving all over L.A. today, trying to find "the city." But there's no city here. It's just a... a giant village.
